fling

Class BNF

  • java.lang.Object
    • fling.BNF

  • public class BNF
extends Object
    Backus-Naur form. Language specification, collection of derivation rules of the form V ::= w X | Y z. Computes grammar's nullables set and firsts/follows mappings.
    Author:
    Ori Roth

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Map<Variable,Notation> extensionHeadsMapping
      Maps generated variables to the notation originated them.

      Maps variables and notations to their follows set.

      Head variables set, containing variables used as API parameters.

      Set of nullable variables and notations.
